tweets.text: When we no longer dread nightimes, when children can play outdoors, when we can have windows open, when people no longer need air purifiers, THEN we will be reassured. Only then @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_WestMids @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA https://t.co/UkZuTDPAht

In the barren wilderness of greed and dishonour are beautiful flowers of hope blooming in our community. Proud to live in Newcastle where even the local tattooist is a total hero ü¶∏ providing air purifiers for ill,children&elderly residents @Cap_it_off @EnvAgency #stopthestink https://t.co/LpZznGNKzL

Not only are the  @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency failing us with the water companies. They are also failing on landfills.  

#StopTheStink https://t.co/QdfH3R7TDh

2212 complaints about one site in a week. To put that into context, that is more than the @EnvAgencyMids and the wider @EnvAgency would expect to see NATIONALLY, over a MONTH for all the sites and incidents they are responsible for. It is imperative to #stopthestink. https://t.co/A0qDU8lGPQ https://t.co/FsL5xnoo7m

We are at great risk of ignoring it & thinking it‚Äôs the local landfill filth mountain. Then boom! @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @PHE_EoEngland @Cap_it_off #stopthestink https://t.co/K3nrL9zVqv

Award Win! Chester-le-Street Flood Alleviation Scheme has won Medium Project of the Year in today's @ICE_NE 30th Robert Stephenson Awards! Congratulations to Esh's civil engineering division, @DurhamCouncil, @Pell_Frischmann & @EnvAgency!

Read more: https://t.co/ORnN5SKhO9 https://t.co/Qzqm6bvzI8

Great @NatureNorth3 workshop session this morning - a real buzz to the conversation & what greater #collaboration at the pan #North scale might add to all the hard work going on across the patch. Great to have partners @The_NP11 speaking positively on nature & green recovery! https://t.co/chzykCkXml

Is that a gas leak? 
No it's Walley's quarry. 
Is that a gas leak? 
No it's Walley's quarry. 
Is that a gas leak? 
No it's Walley's quarry.
So what happens when someone has a gas leak?

Our #humanrights are being breached. We are being tortured mentally and physically in our own homes, living with these constant landfill gases inside & out. It is inhumane, we can‚Äôt enjoy our properties! Wake up @EnvAgency #stopthestink https://t.co/pvfoC1MCRl
@KurtRockin Over 2k complaints last week. https://t.co/ZrzRzL6weA

I worry that I will have a genuine gas leak but will dismiss it thinking that it‚Äôs the landfill smell. I‚Äôm sure I‚Äôm not the only person who has this concern. I couldn‚Äôt possibly call out a Gas company to check every time I smelt gas though  #stopthestink https://t.co/bUunrCOany

urls.title: Why Opening Windows Is a Key to Reopening Schools
urls.description: A simulation of airflow in a real New York City classroom shows how simple ventilation and filtration can reduce the probability of coronavirus exposure.

tweets.text:
It is hard to visualise how air - being invisible - can impact our health so deftly.

Til the scientists get hold of it....

https://t.co/ca9ylXvEW7

urls.title: State of the art of- Impact of Indoor Air Quality in human health.pdf

tweets.text:

By @aireamos

entity.name: Good Morning Britain
entity.description: Good morning, Britain. Up early and need to catch up on the latest news, weather and sports? Then this weekday morning programme is for you, offering the latest information in such areas as entertainment, health and money. `Good Morning Britain' is the typical morning news and talk show. It features a number of presenters, correspondents and reporters covering what you should know to start your day before heading out the door.
